Sanneh asserted that by the time of her death in 2001, Aaliyah "had recorded some of the most innovative and influential pop songs of the last five years."With sales of 8.1 million albums in the United States and an estimated 24 to 32 million albums worldwide,cite webhttp://www.billboard.com/news/ask-billboard-titanic-mid-90s-singers-tori-1003921966.story#/news/ask-billboard-titanic-mid-90s-singers-tori-1003921966.storyAsk Billboard: 'Titanic,' Mid-'90s Singers, Tori AmosCaulfieldKeithDecember 12, 2008BillboardOctober 18, 2010yeshttps://web.archive.org/web/20121108132536/http://www.billboard.com/news/ask-billboard-titanic-mid-90s-singers-tori-1003921966.story8 November 2012cite bookEliotMarcSong of Brooklyn: An Oral History of America's Favorite Borough[[Random House]]2008380-7679-2014-7cite webDecember 18, 2008Canadian R&B Singer Selected to Play Aaliyah in Biopichttp://www.bet.com/news/news/2008/12/30/newscanadiansingertoplayaaliysh.htmlBlack Entertainment TelevisionJuly 6, 2010http://www.usmagazine.com/celebrity-news/news/aaliyahs-35th-birthday-drake-missy-elliot-remember-late-singer-2014161Aaliyah earned thehonorific nicknames in popular musicnicknames"Princess of R&B" and "Queen of Urban Pop",harvnbSutherland200521nonecite webhttp://www.vh1.com/shows/behind_the_music/episode.jhtml?episodeIDEp. 166 | Episode Summary, Highlights, and RecapsVH1March 31, 2012as she "proved she was a muse in her own right".cite newshttp://www.ew.com/ew/article/0,,396798,00.htmlI Care 4 USeymourCraigDecember 13, 2002Entertainment WeeklyJuly 1, 2009Ernest Hardy ofRolling Stonedubbed her as the "undisputed queen of the midtempo come-on".Japanese pop singerHikaru Utadahas said several times that "It was when I heard Aaliyah'sAge Ain't Nothing but a Numberthat I got hooked on R&B.", after which Utada released her debut albumFirst Love (Hikaru Utada album)First Lovewith heavy R&B influences.cite webHikki's Websitehttp://www.emimusic.jp/hikki/gallery/main02_e.htm[[EMI]]March 18, 2012

Aaliyah was honored at the2001 MTV Video Music AwardsbyJanet Jackson,Missy Elliott,Timbaland,Ginuwineand her brother, Rashad, who all paid tribute to her.cite webhttp://www.mtv.com/news/articles/1448717/20010906/aaliyah.jhtmlJanet, Missy, Others Honor Aaliyah During VMAsD'AngeloJoeSeptember 6, 2001MTV NewsJune 17, 2009https://web.archive.org/web/20090601233611/http://www.mtv.com/news/articles/1448717/20010906/aaliyah.jhtmlJune 1, 2009noIn the same year, the United StatesSocial Security Administrationranked the name Aaliyah one of the 100 most popular names for newborn girls.cite bookBrackettNathanHoard, Christian DavidThe New Rolling Stone Album Guide: Completely Revised and Updated 4th Edition[[Simon & Schuster]]200410-7432-0169-8Aaliyah was ranked as one of "The Top 40 Women of the Video Era" inVH1's 2003The Greatestseries.cite webhttp://www.vh1.com/shows/the_greatest/episode.jhtml?episodeIDThe Greatest – Ep. 71 '50 Greatest Women of the Video Era'[[VH1]]June 15, 2009cite newshttp://prnewswire.vn/cgi-bin/stories.pl?ACCTMadonna Tops the List as VH1 Counts Down Music's '100 Sexiest Artists' In Five-Hour, Five Night Special, Premiering September 23–27 at 10:00 pm (ET/PT)September 19, 2003[[PR Newswire]]June 15, 2009She was also ranked at number 18 onBlack Entertainment TelevisionBET's"Top 25 Dancers of All Time".cite webhttp://www.bet.com/OnTV/BETShows/top25dancers.htmTop 25 DancersFebruary 1, 2008Black Entertainment TelevisionJune 15, 2009yeshttps://web.archive.org/20080615142811/http://www.bet.com:80/OnTV/BETShows/top25dancers.htm?15 June 2008Aaliyah appeared on both 2000 and 2001 list ofMaxim (magazine)MaximHot 100 in position 41 and the latter at 14.cite webThe 2000 Hot 100 Listhttp://www.maxim.com/funny/the-2000-hot-100-list[[Maxim (magazine)|Maxim]]March 18, 2012cite webThe 2001 Hot 100 Listhttp://www.maxim.com/funny/the-2001-hot-100-listMaximMarch 18, 2012In 2002VH1created the 100 sexiest artist list and Aaliyah was ranked at number 36.http://www.rockonthenet.com/archive/2002/vh1sexiest.htmIn memory of Aaliyah, theEntertainment Industry Foundationcreated the Aaliyah Memorial Fund to donate money raised to charities she supported.cite newshttp://www.usatoday.com/life/2003-08-04-aaliyah_x.htmCelebs party in Aaliyah's honorEndrstJamesAugust 4, 2003USA TodayJune 17, 2009harvnbSutherland2005205noneIn December 2009,Billboard (magazine)Billboardmagazine ranked Aaliyah at number 70 on its Top Artists of the Decade,cite webhttp://www.billboard.com/#/charts-decade-end/artists-of-the-decade?yearBest of the 2000s – Artists of the DecadeBillboardMay 11, 2010https://web.archive.org/web/20100511064230/http://www.billboard.com/%23/new-releases?nextMay 11, 2010nowhile herAaliyah (album)eponymous albumwas ranked at number 181 on the magazine's Top 200 Albums of the Decade.cite webhttp://www.billboard.com/#/charts-decade-end/billboard-200-albums?yearBest of the 2000s – Billboard 200 AlbumsBillboardDecember 16, 2009She is listed byBillboardas the tenth most successful female R&B artist of the past 25 years, and 27th most successful R&B artist overall.cite newshttp://www.billboard.com/articles/columns/the-juice/950681/the-top-50-rb-hip-hop-artists-of-the-past-25-yearsThe Top 50 R&B / Hip-Hop Artists of the Past 25 YearsTrustGaryCaulfieldKeithRamirezRaulyNovember 18, 2010[[Billboard (magazine)|Billboard]]April 4, 2011In 2012, VH1 ranked her number 48 in "VH1's Greatest Women in Music".cite webhttp://www.vh1.com/music/tuner/2012-02-13/vh1s-100-greatest-women-in-music-complete-list/VH1's 100 Greatest Women in MusicVH1March 16, 2013Also in 2012, Aaliyah was ranked at number 10 onComplex (magazine)Complexmagazine's 100 hottest female singers of all time list.http://www.complex.com/music/2012/12/the-100-hottest-female-singers-of-all-time/aaliyahIn 2014,NME(New Musical Express) ranked Aaliyah at number 18 onNME's 100 most influential artist list.http://www.nme.com/photos/nme-s-100-most-influential-artists-50-1/346061#/photo/1Aaliyah's dress that she wore at the 2000MTV Video Music Award's was featured in the most memorable fashion moments at the VMA's list by the fashion publicationHarper's Bazaarhttp://www.harpersbazaar.com/celebrity/red-carpet-dresses/g4064/iconic-vma-red-carpet-fashion/?src=spr_TWITTER&spr_id=1447_227995126In October 2015 Aaliyah was featured in the 10 women who became Denim Style icons list created by the fashion publicationVogue (magazine)Vogue.http://www.vogue.com/13362464/denim-icons-style-inspiration-gwen-stefani-cindy-crawford/

Aaliyah's work has influenced numerous artists includingAdele,cite webhttp://www.bluesandsoul.com/feature/302/the_futures_looking_rosie_for_adele/ADELE: Up close and personalBluesandsoul.com18 August 2011https://web.archive.org/web/20110708074331/http://www.bluesandsoul.com/feature/302/the_futures_looking_rosie_for_adele/8 July 2011noCiara,cite webhttp://www.allmusic.com/artist/ciara-mn0000215513/relatedCiara – Similar Artists, Influenced By, FollowersAllMusic1985-10-252013-02-13Beyonc Knowles,cite bookhttps://books.google.com/books?idAaliyah: More Than a WomanFarley, Christopher JohnSimon and SchusterJanuary 12, 2011978-0-7434-5566-4November 27, 2001Monica (entertainer)Monica,cite webhttp://www.billboard.com/articles/columns/the-juice/467780/keyshia-cole-monica-swv-ciara-more-female-singers-talk-aaliyahsKeyshia Cole, Monica, SWV, Ciara & More Female Singers Talk Aaliyah's InfluenceBillboard2011-08-242013-12-05Chris Brown,Rihanna,cite webhttp://shelby.tv/video/youtube/lxSfNdx5Ac4/rihanna-fashion-inspired-by-bob-marley-tupac-aaliyahRihanna – Fashion Inspired By Bob Marley,Tupac & AaliyahShelby.tv2013-12-05Azealia Banks,Sevyn Streeter,cite webhttp://bossip.com/772011/nbkotb-sevyn-streeter-visits-aaliyahs-alma-mater-and-covers-come-over-video/Sevyn Streeter Writes Letter To Aaliyah, Covers "Come Over"Bossip2013-05-112013-12-05Keyshia Cole,cite webhttp://www.billboard.com/articles/columns/the-juice/467780/keyshia-cole-monica-swv-ciara-more-female-singers-talk-aaliyahs?pageKeyshia Cole, Monica, SWV, Ciara & More Female Singers Talk Aaliyah's InfluenceBillboard2011-08-242013-12-05J. Cole,cite webhttp://www.fuse.tv/videos/2013/08/fuse-news-aaliyah-interviewJ. Cole Remembers Aaliyah – Interview – Fuse News – FuseFuse.tv2013-08-232013-12-05Kelly Rowland,cite webhttp://www.bet.com/video/musicnews/one-in-a-million/aaliyah-remembered-kellyrowland-s1.htmlAaliyah Remembered: Kelly Rowland | VideosBET2013-12-05Zendaya,cite webhttp://www.mtv.com/news/articles/1714227/zendaya-album-tracks.jhtmlZendaya: Four Tracks You Have To Hear – Music, Celebrity, Artist NewsMTV2013-09-172013-12-05Rita Ora,cite webhttp://www.dailyhoroscopes1.com/Rita-Ora/6841/11.htmRita Ora Horoscope Sagittarius and Zodiac HorseDailyHoroscopes1.com2012-05-04The xx,Arctic Monkeys,http://www.nme.com/photos/40-things-we-ve-learned-about-arctic-monkeys-am/314816#/photo/23Speedy Ortiz,http://nymag.com/thecut/2015/05/speedy-ortiz-was-inspired-by-aaliyah-and-lean-in.htmlChelsea Wolfe,http://www.papermag.com/2015/08/chelsea_wolfe_abyss.phpOmarioncite webhttp://www.rap-up.com/2011/05/12/new-music-omarion-one-in-a-million-aaliyah-cover/New Music: Omarion – 'One in a Million' (Aaliyah Cover)Rap-Up.com2013-12-05Canadian R&B singerKeshia Chantwho was said to play as her in her pending biopic back in 2008, complimented the singer's futuristic style in music and fashion.cite web.http://realtalkny.uproxx.com/2009/02/topic/topic/news/keisha-chante-is-set-to-play-aaliyah-in-an-upcoming-biopic/Keisha Chante Is Set To Play Aaliyah In An Upcoming Biopic » RealTalkNY Brought To You By Nigel DRealtalkny.uproxx.com2013-12-05Keshia Chant backed out of the biopic after speaking to Diane Haughton, but has expressed a willingness to do the project if "the right production comes along and the family's behind it". Keisha also mentioned that Aaliyah had been part of her life "since I was 6."cite newshttp://www.billboard.com/articles/6229108/aaliyah-influence-on-music-and-fashionAaliyah's Afterlife: How the Singer Still Lives on in Music and FashionCloverHopeAugust 22, 2014BillboardR&B singer and friendBrandy NorwoodBrandysaid about the late singer "She came out before Monica and I did, she was our inspiration. At the time, record companies did not believe in kid acts and it was just inspiring to see someone that was winning and winning being themselves. When I met her I embraced her, I was so happy to meet her."cite webhttp://www.billboard.com/articles/columns/the-juice/467746/brandy-speaks-on-her-friendship-with-aaliyahBrandy Speaks on Her Friendship With AaliyahBillboard2013-12-05RapperDrake (rapper)Drakesaid that the singer has had the biggest influence on his career. He also has a tattoo of the singer behind his back.cite webhttp://www.soulculture.co.uk/videos/drake-reflects-aaliyah-had-the-biggest-influence-on-my-music-soulculture-tv/Drake reflects: "Aaliyah had the biggest influence on my music"Soulculture.co.ukJanuary 16, 2011Solange Knowlesremarked on the tenth anniversary of her death that she idolized Aaliyah and proclaimed that she would never be forgotten.cite newshttp://www.mtv.com/news/1669714/aaliyah-death-10-year-anniversary/Aaliyah Remembered By Drake, Mary J. BligeAugust 25, 2011GilKaufmanBETAdam Levinethe lead vocalist of thePop rockgroupMaroon 5remembers that listening to "Are You That Somebody?" convinced him to pursue a more soulful sound than that of his then-band Kara's Flowers.http://articles.latimes.com/2010/oct/20/entertainment/la-et-maroon-5-20101020Erika Ramirez, associate editor of Billboard.com, said at the time of Aaliyah's career "there weren't many artists using the kind of soft vocals the ways she was using it, and now you see a lot of artists doing that and finding success," her reasoning for Aaliyah's continued influence on current artists. She argued that Aaliyah's second albumOne in a Millionwas "very much ahead of its time, with the bass and electro kind of R&B sounds that they produced", referring to collaborators Timbaland and Missy Elliott and that the sound, which "really stood out" at its time, was being replicated.cite newshttp://www.usatoday.com/story/life/music/2014/11/13/impact-aaliyah-princess-of-rb-lifetime/18969815/13 years later, Aaliyah is still R&B's 'Princess'November 13, 2014PatrickRyanUSA Today

In 2012, Britishsinger-songwriterKaty Breleased the songAaliyahas a tribute to Aaliyah's legacy and lasting impression on R&B music.cite webJuzwiakRichToday's Song: Katy B, Jessie Ware and Geeneus "Aaliyah"http://gawker.com/5966746/todays-song-katy-b-jessie-ware-and-geeneus-aaliyahGawker20 August 2013The song first appeared on Katy B'sDangerEP and featuredJessie Wareon guest vocals.

There has been continuing belief that Aaliyah would have achieved greater career success had it not been for her death. Emil Wilbekin mentioned the deaths ofThe Notorious B.I.G.andTupac Shakurin conjunction with hers and added: "Her just-released third album and scheduled role in a sequel toThe Matrixcould have made her anotherJanet JacksonorWhitney Houston".cite newshttp://www.nydailynews.com/archives/money/death-entertainer-story-article-1.927129IN DEATH, ENTERTAINER'S STORY GOES ONDaily NewsNew YorkAugust 31, 2001Director ofQueen of the DamnedMichael Rymersaid of Aaliyah, "God, that girl could have gone so far" and spoke of her having "such a clarity about what she wanted. Nothing was gonna step in her way. No ego, no nervousness, no manipulation. There was nothing to stop her."Farley, p. 168.

On July 18, 2014, it was announced thatAlexandra ShippreplacedZendayafor the role of Aaliyah for theLifetime (TV network)LifetimeTV biopic movieAaliyah: The Princess of R&B, which premiered on November 15, 2014.cite webhttp://www.nydailynews.com/entertainment/tv/alexandra-shipp-play-aaliyah-lifetime-movie-article-1.1872188Aaliyah biopic: Alexandra Shipp to play late R&B star in Lifetime movieDaily NewsNew York14 September 2014cite webhttp://www.thewrap.com/lifetime-announces-premiere-date-for-aaliyah-biopic-the-princess-of-rb/Lifetime Announces Premiere Date for Aaliyah Biopic 'The Princess of R&B'TheWrapZendaya drew criticism because she is biracial while Aaliyah was African-American.She referred to Aaliyah as "one of her biggest inspirations" and insisted that while she could not "please everybody", she could "work really hard and just continue to show [Aaliyah's] legacy. That's all I'm focused on is really, really portraying her in the best light possible. That's all it's about."cite newshttp://www.theguardian.com/music/2014/jun/19/aaliyah-tv-biopic-family-blockFamily of Aaliyah reportedly plan to block a TV biopic about the late singerJune 19, 2014The GuardianSeanMichaelsShe explained her decision to drop out of the film in three videos she posted on Instagram. "The reason why I chose not to do the Aaliyah movie had nothing to do with the haters or people telling me that I couldn't do it, I wasn't talented enough, or I wasn't black enough. It had absolutely nothing to do with that."cite newshttp://abcnews.go.com/blogs/entertainment/2014/07/zendaya-coleman-explains-exit-from-aalyiah-biopic/Zendaya Coleman Explains Exit from Aaliyah BiopicJuly 21, 2014ABC NewsLuchinaFisherAaliyah's family has been vocal in their disapproving of the film. Her cousin Jomo Hankerson stated the family would prefer a "major studio release along the lines" ofWhat's Love Got to Do with It (film)What's Love Got to Do with It, the biopic loosely based on the life ofTina Turner. Aaliyah's family has consulted a lawyer to stop Lifetime from using "any of the music, or any of the photographs and videos" they own and Jomo Hankerson claimed the TV network "didn't reach out."cite newshttp://www.nydailynews.com/entertainment/movies/aaliyah-family-tina-turner-style-biopic-article-1.1842106Aaliyah's family wants big screen biopic with A-list star portraying late singer, not low-budget Lifetime TV movieJune 24, 2014CorkySiemaszkoDaily NewsNew YorkOn August 9, 2014, it was announced that Chattrisse Dolabaille and Izaak Smith had been cast as Aaliyah's collaborators Missy Elliott and Timbaland.cite newshttp://www.billboard.com/biz/articles/news/tv-film/6214312/aaliyah-biopic-adds-missy-elliott-and-timbaland-roles-reportAaliyah Biopic Adds Missy Elliott and Timbaland Roles: ReportAugust 9, 2014BillboardJocelynVenaDolabaille received criticism for her appearance in comparison with that of Missy Elliot.The Urban Dailywrote: "The hushed frustrations around the industry are mainly pertaining to the fact that the actress is nothing like Missy Elliott. She is much lighter, she is much smaller and she doesn't seem to have any Hip Hop or R&B background. Some feel that the biopic creators didn't look hard enough for someone more appropriate to play Missy."cite newshttp://theurbandaily.com/2014/08/09/fans-unhappy-with-casting-choice-for-missy-elliott-role-in-aaliyah-biopic/Fans Unhappy With Casting Choice For Missy Elliott Role In Aaliyah BiopicAugust 9, 2014The Urban Daily

A feature film, scheduled for release in theaters in 2015, was reported in August 2014 to star B. Simone and have involvement from Aaliyah's uncle Barry Hankerson. The film is stated to feature unreleased music by the late singer. The script will be written by author Zane.cite newshttp://www.eurweb.com/2014/08/singer-b-simone-set-to-star-in-new-aaliyah-biopic/Singer B. Simone Set to Star in Another Aaliyah BiopicAugust 3, 2014EURwebIt was announced in February 2015 that a tribute dinner would be held for Aaliyah by The Sugar Club in Dublin later that month.cite newshttp://entertainment.ie/music/news/Aaliyah-tribute-night-taking-place-in-Dublin-at-the-end-of-this-month/340180.htmAaliyah tribute night taking place in Dublin at the end of the monthentertainment.ieLaurenMurphyFebruary 12, 2015
